potoloho ea litaelo: Mehato eo CPU e e latelang ho phethahatsa taelo e le 'ngoe
superscalar Architecture: Moralo oa CPU o ka phethahatsang litaelo tse ngata ka potoloho ea oache
bolepi ba lekala: Mokhoa moo CPU e lekang ho hakanya hore na maemo a tla ea ka tsela efe
northbridge: Chipset (litsamaiso tsa khale) tse hokahanyang CPU le RAM le libese tse lebelo le holimo
southbridge: Chipset (litsamaiso tsa khale) tse neng li sebetsana butle le li-peripherals le I/O
hyperthreading: Theknoloji e lumellang CPU e le 'ngoe hore e hlahe e le li-cores tse ngata tse utloahalang
risc: Khomphuta e Fokotsoeng ea Taelo - Moralo oa CPU o nang le litaelo tse bonolo
cisc: Complex Instruction Set Computer - Moralo oa CPU o nang le litaelo tse matla, tse rarahaneng
simd: Taelo e le 'Ngoe ea Multiple Data, mokhoa oa ho sebetsana le data ka ho tšoana
microarchitecture: Lintlha tse ikhethileng tsa ts'ebetsong ea sete ea litaelo tsa CPU
tsamaiso holim'a chip: Ho kopanya likarolo tse ngata (CPU, GPU, joalo-joalo) ho chip e le 'ngoe
sistimi e kentsoeng: Sistimi ea komporo e inehetseng mosebetsing o itseng, hangata ka har'a sesebelisoa se seholoanyane
firmware: Software e bolokiloe ka ho sa feleng sesebelisoa sa Hardware (joalo ka BIOS)
overclocking: Ho tsamaisa CPU ka lebelo le holimo ho feta litlhaloso tse reriloeng
khoutu ea ho lokisa phoso: Mokhoa oa ho bona le ho lokisa liphoso ho RAM
ts'ebetsong e tsoileng taolong: Mokhoa moo CPU e phethahatsang litaelo ka tatellano e sebetsang haholoanyane
quantum computing: Ho kopanya melaoana ea quantum mechanics bakeng sa ho bala
khomphutha ea neuromorphic: Meaho ea komporo e bululetsoeng ke boko e etselitsoeng mesebetsi ea AI
